stem.name: Begin Episode
stem.definition: marks the beginning of a new episode

stem.name: Begin Scene
stem.definition: marks the beginning of a new scene (e.g., One day ...)

stem.name: Bodypart
stem.definition: marks bodyparts (hand of Mary)

stem.name: Composed of
stem.definition: one thing is composed of something (lake of fire, streets of gold, river of fire)

stem.name: Group
stem.definition: marks a group of something (herd of sheep, flock of geese, crowd of people, etc.)

stem.name: Iteration
stem.definition: marks iteration (Mary read the book Iteration 3/many.)

stem.name: Kinship
stem.definition: marks blood relationships (brother, mother, etc.) and legal relationships (wife, mother-in-law, etc.)

stem.name: Made of
stem.definition: one thing is made of another thing (house of bricks, table of wood, etc.)

stem.name: Nationality
stem.definition: a Hebrew man

stem.name: Owner
stem.definition: marks a possessor (book of John)

stem.name: Part-Whole
stem.definition: the front of the boat

stem.name: Quantity
stem.definition: marks quantity (tea Quantity cup)

stem.name: Region of Authority
stem.definition: marks the region that someone governs (king of Israel, governor of Tiberius, etc.)

stem.name: about
stem.definition: concerning (told him about ...)

stem.name: above
stem.definition: on top of something, but not touching

stem.name: across
stem.definition: location on the other side of

stem.name: after
stem.definition: the time following

stem.name: after
stem.definition: the time following (used only in NPs)

stem.name: against
stem.definition: one thing is next to and touching something else (John leaned against the wall.)

stem.name: ago
stem.definition: used in oblique NPs (Many years ago ...)

stem.name: along
stem.definition: location along a path

stem.name: although
stem.definition: although X happens, Y will happen

stem.name: among
stem.definition: in the midst of

stem.name: around
stem.definition: the area around something

stem.name: at
stem.definition: at the location

stem.name: at
stem.definition: time at (at midnight)

stem.name: because
stem.definition: the following event is the reason for the preceeding event (John walked to school because his car was at the shop.)

stem.name: because
stem.definition: the following object is the reason for the event

stem.name: before
stem.definition: time before an event

stem.name: before
stem.definition: time before an event (used only in NPs)

stem.name: behind
stem.definition: location behind someone

stem.name: beside
stem.definition: next to, spacially

stem.name: between
stem.definition: involving a and b (agreement between a and b)

stem.name: between
stem.definition: location in the middle of a and b

stem.name: by
stem.definition: to accomplish something by doing something else (John won the game by hitting a home run.)

stem.name: by
stem.definition: nearby something

stem.name: close
stem.definition: to be close to something (AP)

stem.name: down
stem.definition: down - used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: during
stem.definition: time is during the stated event

stem.name: even-if
stem.definition: the preceeding will happen even if the following happens

stem.name: even-though
stem.definition: contrary to fact, even-though A, B still happened

stem.name: except
stem.definition: the following event or thing is an exception (follow no gods except me)

stem.name: far-away-from
stem.definition: far in distance from something else

stem.name: for
stem.definition: for a duration of time (for 3 days)

stem.name: for
stem.definition: because of (I will pay you for your work)

stem.name: for
stem.definition: beneficiary topic marker (For each kind of animal, bring a male and a female into the ark.)

stem.name: from
stem.definition: from the time specified

stem.name: if
stem.definition: if (conditional) (If you go to the party, you might see Mary.)

stem.name: if
stem.definition: if (hypothetical) (If you were to go to the party, you would see Mary.)

stem.name: if
stem.definition: if (counterfactual) (If you had gone to the party, you would have seen Mary.)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: located inside something, literally (like a basket, or a house)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: located within the boundaries of an area (in the city)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: generic location

stem.name: in
stem.definition: in a group (John is in the army.)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: at the time (in the morning)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: in a liquid, sand, dirt, etc.

stem.name: in
stem.definition: to be or put in a written or other medium (write in a book, in the history)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: abstract directed towards someone (faith in God)

stem.name: in
stem.definition: in a vision or dream (God spoke to Abram in a vision.)

stem.name: in-front-of
stem.definition: location in front of something

stem.name: in-order-to
stem.definition: the preceeding was done to accomplish the following

stem.name: inside
stem.definition: within an object

stem.name: instead
stem.definition: X did A instead of doing B (John read this book instead of watching a movie.) (always same agent as matrix)

stem.name: instead
stem.definition: X did Y instead of A doing B (Esther 9:1 The Jews killed their enemies instead of their enemies killing them.) (always different agent than the matrix)

stem.name: instead
stem.definition: used with NPs like "He went [to X [instead-of Y]]" or "He hit [X [instead-of Y]]"

stem.name: into
stem.definition: location towards somewhere

stem.name: into
stem.definition: into a container or enclosed area

stem.name: just-like
stem.definition: to do something in the same way as some other action

stem.name: later
stem.definition: amount of time after an event

stem.name: more-than
stem.definition: (I like this more-than I like that)

stem.name: near
stem.definition: location close to something

stem.name: of-possession
stem.definition: possession - used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: off
stem.definition: off - used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: on
stem.definition: on top (highest part) of something

stem.name: on
stem.definition: on the surface of something (not necessarily the top)

stem.name: on
stem.definition: generic location (on the left side)

stem.name: on
stem.definition: along (walk on the path)

stem.name: on
stem.definition: at the time of (on that day)

stem.name: on
stem.definition: connected to (apple on the tree)

stem.name: onto
stem.definition: motion on to something

stem.name: out
stem.definition: out - used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: outside
stem.definition: outside an object

stem.name: over
stem.definition: on top of

stem.name: past
stem.definition: movement past a location (Mary walked past the house.)

stem.name: since
stem.definition: since the time

stem.name: so
stem.definition: the preceeding was done so that the following can/could be done (John studied so that he could pass the test.)

stem.name: so
stem.definition: result, with no intent (He lost his money so he had to leave)

stem.name: so
stem.definition: the preceeding was or should be done resulting in the following being done (John covered his face so that he would not catch a cold.)

stem.name: than
stem.definition: than - used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: through
stem.definition: path through someplace

stem.name: through
stem.definition: by means of (God predicted through a prophet ...)

stem.name: throughout
stem.definition: located everywhere within some place

stem.name: to
stem.definition: to - used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: toward
stem.definition: path toward someplace

stem.name: toward
stem.definition: movement is toward an object or place

stem.name: under
stem.definition: location under something

stem.name: unless
stem.definition: the previous would not happen unless the following does

stem.name: until
stem.definition: time until

stem.name: until
stem.definition: time until (used on in NPs)

stem.name: up
stem.definition: used only in the Analyzer

stem.name: when
stem.definition: when + event specifies the time of the main event

stem.name: when
stem.definition: when-because + event specifies the time and reason for the main event

stem.name: whenever
stem.definition: one event is done whenever another event is done (I see Mary whenever I go to the library.)

stem.name: while
stem.definition: time during the following event

stem.name: with
stem.definition: accompaniment (John went with Frank)

stem.name: with
stem.definition: possessing things (John went to California with many things.)

stem.name: without
stem.definition: to do something without using something

stem.name: without
stem.definition: to do something without someone accompanying
